column4: i'm having 5.1 speakers with audigy sound card. I hear music only from front two speakers. I tried all combination in alsamixer.But nothing woked. How do i activate all 6 speakers including woofer?
with this command 'speaker-test -Dplug:surround51 -c6 ' all my speaker works!
but how do i make it work when i play music?
have you specified the correct settings in Systems -> Preferences -> Multimedia Selector?
i dont have Multimedia Selector menu!
I'm using ubuntu 6.10
might be called Multimedia Systems Selector, and you might have to use the menu editor to activate it, as it might not be by default
how do i activate it?
all the available menus are activated
try System -> Preferences -> Menu Layout
all menus are activated
then you're out of luck, sorry :)
but how do i activate my three speakers?
only front two speakers and front two are working!
only front two speakers and woofer are working

my guess is that you need to select the appropriate media system from the menu. if you can not find the application for that, you can try googling for your card and see if someone has come up with a solution
but my soundcard is supported by alsa. i confirmed it from their sire
*site
the card maybe supported, but in 5.1?
but how do i check that?
they should have a web page for the card itself, and it should mention whether 5.1 support is there
thanks sipior.Let me check that
good luck
